entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as making fun of the books and Hagrid's teaching. He is also mentioned to be quiet and then loud.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as wanting Hagrid's lesson to be a success and repeating 'shut up' to Malfoy.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as looking downcast and trying to teach the class. He seems to have lost his thread and goes to get the Magical Creatures.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A dementor is mentioned to be behind Harry.

relationships.description: Harry repeatedly tells Malfoy to shut up.
Hagrid is teaching the class about Magical Creatures.
